gift.name: Resistance
gift.desc: Subject gains +1 on saving throws.

gift.name: Ray of Frost
gift.desc: Ray deals 1d3 cold damage.

gift.name: Detect Poison
gift.desc: Detects poison in one creature or small object.

gift.name: Daze
gift.desc: Creature loses next action.

gift.name: Flare
gift.desc: Dazzles one creature (-1 attack).

gift.name: Light
gift.desc: Object shines like a torch.

gift.name: Dancing Lights
gift.desc: Figment torches or other lights.

gift.name: Ghost Sound
gift.desc: Figment sounds.

gift.name: Disrupt Undead
gift.desc: Deals 1d6 damage to one undead.

gift.name: Mage Hand
gift.desc: 5-pound telekinesis.

gift.name: Mending
gift.desc: Makes minor repairs on an object.

gift.name: Open/Close
gift.desc: Opens or closes small or light things.

gift.name: Arcane Mark
gift.desc: Inscribes a personal rune (visible or invisible).

gift.name: Detect Magic
gift.desc: Detects gifts and magic items within 60 ft.

gift.name: Prestidigitation
gift.desc: Performs minor tricks.

gift.name: Read Magic
gift.desc: Read scrolls and giftbooks.

gift.name: Alarm
gift.desc: Wards an area for 2 hours/level.

gift.name: Endure Elements
gift.desc: Ignores 5 damage/round from one energy type.

gift.name: Hold Portal
gift.desc: Holds door shut.

gift.name: Protection from Chaos/Evil/Good/Law
gift.desc: +2 AC and saves, counter mind control, hedge out elementals and outsiders.

gift.name: Shield
gift.desc: Invisible disc gives cover and blocks magic missiles.

gift.name: Grease
gift.desc: Makes 10-ft. square or one object slippery.

gift.name: Mage Armor
gift.desc: Gives subject +4 armor bonus.

gift.name: Mount
gift.desc: Summons riding horse for 2 hr./level.

gift.name: Obscuring Mist
gift.desc: Fog surrounds you.

gift.name: Summon Monster I
gift.desc: Calls outsider to fight for you.

gift.name: Unseen Servant
gift.desc: Creates invisible force that obeys your commands.

gift.name: Comprehend Languages
gift.desc: Understands all spoken and written languages.

gift.name: Detect Secret Doors
gift.desc: Reveals hidden doors within 60 ft.

gift.name: Detect Undead
gift.desc: Reveals undead within 60 ft.

gift.name: Identify
gift.desc: Determines single feature of magic item.

gift.name: True Strike
gift.desc: Adds +20 bonus to your next attack roll.

gift.name: Charm Person
gift.desc: Makes one person your friend.

gift.name: Hypnotism
gift.desc: Fascinates 2d4 HD of creatures.

gift.name: Sleep
gift.desc: Put 2d4 HD of creatures into comatose slumber.

gift.name: Magic Missile
gift.desc: 1d4+1 damage; +1 missile/two levels above 1st (max +5).

gift.name: Tensers Floating Disk
gift.desc: 3-ft.-diameter horizontal disk that holds 100 lb./level.

gift.name: Change Self
gift.desc: Changes your appearance.

gift.name: Color Spray
gift.desc: Knocks unconscious, blinds, or stuns 1d6 weak creatures.

gift.name: Nystuls Magical Aura
gift.desc: Grants object false magic aura.

gift.name: Nystuls Undetectable Aura
gift.desc: Masks magic items aura.

gift.name: Silent Image
gift.desc: Creates minor illusion of your design.

gift.name: Ventriloquism
gift.desc: Throws voice for 1 min./level.

gift.name: Cause Fear
gift.desc: One creature flees for 1d4 rounds.

gift.name: Chill Touch
gift.desc: 1 touch/level deals 1d6 damage and possibly 1 Str damage.

gift.name: Ray of Enfeeblement
gift.desc: Ray reduces Str by 1d6 points +1 point/two levels.

gift.name: Animate Rope
gift.desc: Makes a rope move at your command.

gift.name: Burning Hands
gift.desc: 1d4 fire damage/level (max: 5d4).

gift.name: Enlarge
gift.desc: Object or creature grows +10%/level (max +50%).

gift.name: Erase
gift.desc: Mundane or magical writing vanishes.

gift.name: Expeditious Retreat
gift.desc: Doubles your speed.

gift.name: Feather Fall
gift.desc: Objects or creatures fall slowly.

gift.name: Jump
gift.desc: Subject gets +30 on Jump checks.

gift.name: Magic Weapon
gift.desc: Weapon gains +1 bonus.

gift.name: Message
gift.desc: Whispered conversation at distance.

gift.name: Reduce
gift.desc: Object or creature shrinks 10%/level (max 50%).

gift.name: Shocking Grasp
gift.desc: Touch delivers 1d8 +1/level electricity.

gift.name: Spider Climb
gift.desc: Grants ability to walk on walls and ceilings.

gift.name: Arcane Lock
gift.desc: Magically locks a portal or chest.

gift.name: Obscure Object
gift.desc: Masks object against divination.

gift.name: Protection from Arrows
gift.desc: Subject immune to most ranged attacks.

gift.name: Resist Elements
gift.desc: Ignores 12 damage/round from one energy type.

gift.name: Fog Cloud
gift.desc: Fog obscures vision.

gift.name: Glitterdust
gift.desc: Blinds creatures, outlines invisible creatures.

gift.name: Melfs Acid Arrow
gift.desc: Ranged touch attack; 2d4 damage for 1 round + 1 round/three levels.

gift.name: Summon Monster II
gift.desc: Calls outsider to fight for you.

gift.name: Summon Swarm
gift.desc: Summons swarm of small crawling or flying creatures.

gift.name: Web
gift.desc: Fills 10-ft. cube/level with sticky spider webs.

gift.name: Detect Thoughts
gift.desc: Allows listening to surface thoughts.

gift.name: Locate Object
gift.desc: Senses direction toward object (specific or type).

gift.name: See Invisibility
gift.desc: Reveals invisible creatures or objects.

gift.name: Tashas Hideous Laughter
gift.desc: Subject loses actions for 1d3 rounds.

gift.name: Darkness
gift.desc: 20-ft. radius of supernatural darkness.

gift.name: Daylight
gift.desc: 60-ft. radius of bright light.

gift.name: Flaming Sphere
gift.desc: Rolling ball of fire, 2d6 damage, lasts 1 round/level.

gift.name: Shatter
gift.desc: Sonic vibration damages objects or crystalline creatures.

gift.name: Blur
gift.desc: Attacks miss subject 20% of the time.

gift.name: Continual Flame
gift.desc: Makes a permanent, heatless torch.

gift.name: Hypnotic Pattern
gift.desc: Fascinates 2d4+1 HD/level of creatures.

gift.name: Invisibility
gift.desc: Subject is invisible for 10 min./level or until it attacks.

gift.name: Leomunds Trap
gift.desc: Makes item seem trapped.

gift.name: Magic Mouth
gift.desc: Speaks once when triggered.

gift.name: Minor Image
gift.desc: As silent image, plus some sound.

gift.name: Mirror Image
gift.desc: Creates decoy duplicates of you (1d4 +1/three levels, max 8).

gift.name: Misdirection
gift.desc: Misleads divinations for one creature or object.

gift.name: Ghoul Touch
gift.desc: Paralyzes one subject, who exudes stench (-2 penalty) nearby.

gift.name: Scare
gift.desc: Panics creatures up to 5 HD (15-ft. radius).

gift.name: Spectral Hand
gift.desc: Creates disembodied glowing hand to deliver touch attacks.

gift.name: Alter Self
gift.desc: As change self, plus more drastic changes.

gift.name: Blindness/Deafness
gift.desc: Makes subject blind or deaf.

gift.name: Bulls Strength
gift.desc: Subject gains 1d4+1 Str for 1 hr./level.

gift.name: Cats Grace
gift.desc: Subject gains 1d4+1 Dex for 1 hr./level.

gift.name: Darkvision
gift.desc: See 60 ft. in total darkness.

gift.name: Endurance
gift.desc: Gain 1d4+1 Con for 1 hr./level.

gift.name: Knock
gift.desc: Opens locked or magically sealed door.

gift.name: Levitate
gift.desc: Subject moves up and down at your direction.

gift.name: Pyrotechnics
gift.desc: Turns fire into blinding light or choking smoke.

gift.name: Rope Trick
gift.desc: Up to eight creatures hide in extradimensional space.

gift.name: Whispering Wind
gift.desc: Sends a short message one mile/level.

gift.name: Dispel Magic
gift.desc: Cancels magical gifts and effects.

gift.name: Explosive Runes
gift.desc: Deals 6d6 damage when read.

gift.name: Magic Circle against Chaos/Evil/Good/Law
gift.desc: As protection gifts, but 10-ft. radius and 10 min./level.

gift.name: Nondetection
gift.desc: Hides subject from divination, scrying.

gift.name: Protection from Elements
gift.desc: Absorb 12 damage/level from one kind of energy.

gift.name: Flame Arrow
gift.desc: Shoots flaming projectiles (extra damage) or fiery bolts (4d6 damage).

gift.name: Phantom Steed
gift.desc: Magical horse appears for 1 hour/level.

gift.name: Sepia Snake Sigil
gift.desc: Creates text symbol that immobilizes reader.

gift.name: Sleet Storm
gift.desc: Hampers vision and movement.

gift.name: Stinking Cloud
gift.desc: Nauseating vapors, 1 round/level.

gift.name: Summon Monster III
gift.desc: Calls outsider to fight for you.

gift.name: Clairaudience/Clairvoyance
gift.desc: Hear or see at a distance for 1 min./level.

gift.name: Tongues
gift.desc: Speak any language.

gift.name: Hold Person
gift.desc: Holds one person helpless; 1 round/level.

gift.name: Suggestion
gift.desc: Compels subject to follow stated course of action.

gift.name: Fireball
gift.desc: 1d6 damage per level, 20-ft. radius.

gift.name: Gust of Wind
gift.desc: Blows away or knocks down smaller creatures.

gift.name: Leomunds Tiny Hut
gift.desc: Creates shelter for 10 creatures.

gift.name: Lightning Bolt
gift.desc: Electricity deals 1d6 damage/level.

gift.name: Wind Wall
gift.desc: Deflects arrows, smaller creatures, and gases.

gift.name: Displacement
gift.desc: Attacks miss subject 50%.

gift.name: Illusory Script
gift.desc: Only intended reader can decipher.

gift.name: Invisibility Sphere
gift.desc: Makes everyone within 10 ft. invisible.

gift.name: Major Image
gift.desc: As silent image, plus sound, smell and thermal effects.

gift.name: Gentle Repose
gift.desc: Preserves one corpse.

gift.name: Halt Undead
gift.desc: Immobilizes undead for 1 round/level.

gift.name: Vampiric Touch
gift.desc: Touch deals 1d6/two caster levels; caster gains damage as hp.

gift.name: Blink
gift.desc: You randomly vanish and reappear for 1 round/level.

gift.name: Fly
gift.desc: Subject flies at speed of 90.

gift.name: Gaseous Form
gift.desc: Subject becomes insubstantial and can fly slowly.

gift.name: Greater Magic Weapon
gift.desc: +1/three levels (max +5).

gift.name: Haste
gift.desc: Extra partial action and +4 AC.

gift.name: Keen Edge
gift.desc: Doubles normal weapons threat range.

gift.name: Secret Page
gift.desc: Changes one page to hide its real content.

gift.name: Shrink Item
gift.desc: Object shrinks to one-twelfth size.

gift.name: Slow
gift.desc: One subject/level takes only partial actions, -2 AC, -2 melee rolls.

gift.name: Water Breathing
gift.desc: Subjects can breathe underwater.

gift.name: Dimensional Anchor
gift.desc: Bars extradimensional movement.

gift.name: Fire Trap
gift.desc: Opened object deals 1d4 +1/level damage.

gift.name: Minor Globe of Invulnerability
gift.desc: Stops 1st- through 3rd-level gift effects.

gift.name: Remove Curse
gift.desc: Frees object or person from curse.

gift.name: Stoneskin
gift.desc: Stops blows, cuts, stabs, and slashes.

gift.name: Evards Black Tentacles
gift.desc: 1d4 +1/level tentacles grapple randomly within 15 ft.

gift.name: Leomunds Secure Shelter
gift.desc: Creates sturdy cottage.

gift.name: Minor Creation
gift.desc: Creates one cloth or wood object.

gift.name: Solid Fog
gift.desc: Blocks vision and slows movement.

gift.name: Summon Monster IV
gift.desc: Calls outsider to fight for you.

gift.name: Arcane Eye
gift.desc: Invisible floating eye moves 30 ft./round.

gift.name: Detect Scrying
gift.desc: Alerts you of magical eavesdropping.

gift.name: Locate Creature
gift.desc: Indicates direction to familiar creature.

gift.name: Scrying
gift.desc: Spies on subject from a distance.

gift.name: Charm Monster
gift.desc: Makes monster believe it is your ally.

gift.name: Confusion
gift.desc: Makes subject behave oddly for 1 round/level.

gift.name: Emotion
gift.desc: Arouses strong emotion in subject.

gift.name: Lesser Geas
gift.desc: Commands subject of 7 HD or less.

gift.name: Fire Shield
gift.desc: Creatures attacking you take fire damage; you are protected from heat or cold.

gift.name: Ice Storm
gift.desc: Hail deals 5d6 damage in cylinder 40 ft. across.

gift.name: Otilukes Resilient Sphere
gift.desc: Force globe protects but traps one subject.

gift.name: Shout
gift.desc: Deafens all within cone and deals 2d6 damage.

gift.name: Wall of Fire
gift.desc: Deals 2d4 fire damage out to 10 ft. and 1d4 out to 20 ft.

gift.name: Wall of Ice
gift.desc: Ice plane creates wall with 15 hp +1/level, or hemisphere can trap creatures inside.

gift.name: Hallucinatory Terrain
gift.desc: Makes one type of terrain appear like another (field into forest, etc).

gift.name: Illusory Wall
gift.desc: Wall, floor, or ceiling looks real, but anything can pass through.

gift.name: Improved Invisibility
gift.desc: As invisibility, but subject can attack and stay invisible.

gift.name: Phantasmal Killer
gift.desc: Fearsome illusion kills subject or deals 3d6 damage.

gift.name: Rainbow Pattern
gift.desc: Lights prevent 24 HD of creatures from attacking or moving away.

gift.name: Shadow Conjuration
gift.desc: Mimics conjuring below 4th level.

gift.name: Contagion
gift.desc: Infects subject with chosen disease.

gift.name: Enervation
gift.desc: Subject gains 1d4 negative levels.

gift.name: Fear
gift.desc: Subjects within cone flee for 1 round/level.

gift.name: Bestow Curse
gift.desc: -6 to an ability; -4 on attacks, saves, and checks; or 50% chance of losing each action.

gift.name: Dimension Door
gift.desc: Teleports you and up to 500 lb.

gift.name: Polymorph Other
gift.desc: Gives one subject a new form.

gift.name: Polymorph Self
gift.desc: You assume a new form.

gift.name: Rarys Mnemonic Enhancer
gift.desc: Prepares extra gifts or retains one just cast. Wizard only.

gift.name: Dismissal
gift.desc: Forces a creature to return to native plane.

gift.name: Cloudkill
gift.desc: Kills 3 HD or less; 4-6 HD save or die.

gift.name: Leomunds Secret Chest
gift.desc: Hides expensive chest on Ethereal Plane; you retrieve it at will.

gift.name: Lesser Planar Binding
gift.desc: Traps outsider until it performs a task.

gift.name: Major Creation
gift.desc: As minor creation, plus stone and metal.

gift.name: Mordenkainens Faithful Hound
gift.desc: Phantom dog can guard, attack.

gift.name: Summon Monster V
gift.desc: Calls outsider to fight for you.

gift.name: Wall of Iron
gift.desc: 30 hp/four levels; can topple onto foes.

gift.name: Wall of Stone
gift.desc: 20 hp/four levels; can be shaped.

gift.name: Contact Other Plane
gift.desc: Ask question of extraplanar entity.

gift.name: Prying Eyes
gift.desc: 1d4 floating eyes +1/level scout for you.

gift.name: Rarys Telepathic Bond
gift.desc: Link lets allies communicate.

gift.name: Dominate Person
gift.desc: Controls humanoid telepathically.

gift.name: Feeblemind
gift.desc: Subjects Int drops to 1.

gift.name: Hold Monster
gift.desc: As hold person, but any creature.

gift.name: Mind Fog
gift.desc: Subjects in fog get -10 Wis, Will checks.

gift.name: Bigbys Interposing Hand
gift.desc: Hand provides 90% cover against one opponent.

gift.name: Cone of Cold
gift.desc: 1d6 cold damage/level.

gift.name: Sending
gift.desc: Delivers short message anywhere, instantly.

gift.name: Wall of Force
gift.desc: Wall is immune to damage.

gift.name: Dream
gift.desc: Sends message to anyone sleeping.

gift.name: False Vision
gift.desc: Fools scrying with an illusion.

gift.name: Greater Shadow Conjuration
gift.desc: As shadow conjuration, but up to 4th level and 40% real.

gift.name: Mirage Arcana
gift.desc: As hallucinatory terrain, plus structures.

gift.name: Nightmare
gift.desc: Sends vision dealing 1d10 damage, fatigue.

gift.name: Persistent Image
gift.desc: As major image, but no concentration required.

gift.name: Seeming
gift.desc: Changes appearance of one person/two levels.

gift.name: Shadow Evocation
gift.desc: Mimics evocation less than 5th level.

gift.name: Animate Dead
gift.desc: Creates undead skeletons and zombies.

gift.name: Magic Jar
gift.desc: Enables possession of another creature.

gift.name: Animal Growth
gift.desc: One animal/two levels doubles in size, HD.

gift.name: Fabricate
gift.desc: Transforms raw materials into finished items.

gift.name: Passwall
gift.desc: Breaches walls 1 ft. thick/level.

gift.name: Stone Shape
gift.desc: Sculpts stone into any form.

gift.name: Telekinesis
gift.desc: Lifts or moves 25 lb./level at long range.

gift.name: Teleport
gift.desc: Instantly transports you anywhere.

gift.name: Transmute Mud to Rock
gift.desc: Transforms two 10-ft. cubes/level.

gift.name: Transmute Rock to Mud
gift.desc: Transforms two 10-ft. cubes/level.

gift.desc: Makes certain gifts permanent; costs XP.

gift.name: Antimagic Field
gift.desc: Negates magic within 10 ft.

gift.name: Globe of Invulnerability
gift.desc: As minor globe, plus 4th level.

gift.name: Greater Digifting
gift.desc: As dispel magic, but +20 on check.

gift.desc: Array of magic effects protect area.

gift.name: Repulsion
gift.desc: Creatures cant approach you.

gift.name: Planar Binding
gift.desc: As lesser planar binding, but up to 16 HD.

gift.desc: Calls outsider to fight for you.

gift.name: Analyze Dweomer
gift.desc: Reveals magical aspects of subject.

gift.desc: Learn tales about a person, place, or thing.

gift.name: True Seeing
gift.desc: See all things as they really are.

gift.name: Geas/Quest
gift.desc: As lesser geas, plus it affects any creature.

gift.name: Mass Suggestion
gift.desc: As suggestion, plus one/level subjects.

gift.name: Bigbys Forceful Hand
gift.desc: Hand pushes creatures away.

gift.name: Chain Lightning
gift.desc: 1d6 damage/level; secondary bolts.

gift.name: Contingency
gift.desc: Sets trigger condition for another gift.

gift.name: Otilukes Freezing Sphere
gift.desc: Freezes water or deals cold damage.

gift.name: Greater Shadow Evocation
gift.desc: As shadow evocation, but up to 5th level.

gift.name: Mislead

gift.name: Permanent Image
gift.desc: Includes sight, sound, and smell.

gift.name: Programmed Image
gift.desc: As major image, plus triggered by event.

gift.name: Project Image
gift.desc: Illusory double can talk and cast gifts.

gift.name: Shades
gift.desc: As shadow conjuration, but up to 5th level and 60% real.

gift.name: Veil
gift.desc: Changes appearance of group of creatures.

gift.name: Circle of Death
gift.desc: Kills 1d4 HD/level.

gift.name: Control Water
gift.desc: Raises, lowers, or parts bodies of water.

gift.name: Control Weather
gift.desc: Changes weather in local area.

gift.name: Disintegrate
gift.desc: Makes one creature or object vanish.

gift.name: Eyebite
gift.desc: Charm, fear, sicken or sleep one subject.

gift.name: Flesh to Stone
gift.desc: Turns subject creature into statue.

gift.name: Mass Haste
gift.desc: As haste, affects one/level subjects.

gift.name: Mordenkainens Lucubration
gift.desc: Recalls gift of 5th level or less. Wizard Only.

gift.name: Move Earth
gift.desc: Digs trenches and build hills.

gift.desc: Restores petrified creature.

gift.name: Banishment

gift.name: Sequester

gift.name: gift Turning
gift.desc: Reflect 1d4+6 gift levels back at caster.

gift.name: Drawmijs Instant Summons
gift.desc: Prepared object appears in your hand.

gift.name: Mordenkainens Magnificent Mansion
gift.desc: Door leads to extradimensional mansion.

gift.name: Phase Door
gift.desc: Invisible passage through wood or stone.

gift.name: Power Word, Stun

gift.desc: Calls outsider to fight for you.

gift.desc: As scrying, but faster and longer.

gift.desc: As legend lore, but quicker and strenuous.

gift.name: Bigbys Grasping Hand

gift.name: Mordenkainens Sword
gift.desc: Floating magic blade strikes opponents.

gift.name: Prismatic Spray
gift.desc: Rays hit subjects with variety of effects.

gift.name: Mass Invisibility
gift.desc: As invisibility, but affects all in range.

gift.name: Shadow Walk
gift.desc: Step into shadow to travel rapidly.

gift.name: Simulacrum
gift.desc: Creates partially real double of a creature.

gift.desc: Undead dont attack you while under your command.

gift.name: Finger of Death

gift.name: Ethereal Jaunt
gift.desc: You become ethereal for 1 round/level.

gift.name: Plane Shift

gift.name: Reverse Gravity
gift.desc: Objects and creatures fall upward.

gift.name: Statue

gift.desc: As teleport, but no off-target arrival.

gift.name: Vanish
gift.desc: As teleport, but affects a touched object.

gift.name: Limited Wish
gift.desc: Alters reality-within gift limits.

gift.name: Mind Blank
gift.desc: Subject is immune to mental/emotional magic and scrying.

gift.name: Prismatic Wall
gift.desc: Walls colors have array of effects.

gift.name: Protection from gifts
gift.desc: Confers +8 resistance bonus.

gift.name: Greater Planar Binding
gift.desc: As lesser planar binding, but up to 24 HD.

gift.name: Incendiary Cloud
gift.desc: Cloud deals 4d6 fire damage/round.

gift.name: Maze
gift.desc: Traps subject in extradimensional maze.

gift.name: Power Word, Blind
gift.desc: Blinds 200 hp worth of creatures.

gift.name: Summon Monster VIII
gift.desc: Calls outsider to fight for you.

gift.name: Trap the Soul
gift.desc: Imprisons subject within gem.

gift.name: Discern Location
gift.desc: Exact location of creature or object.

gift.name: Antipathy
gift.desc: Object or location affected by gift repels certain creatures.

gift.name: Binding
gift.desc: Array of techniques to imprison a creature.

gift.name: Demand
gift.desc: As sending, plus you can send suggestion.

gift.name: Mass Charm
gift.desc: As charm monster, but all within 30 ft.

gift.name: Ottos Irresistible Dance
gift.desc: Forces subject to dance.

gift.name: Sympathy
gift.desc: Object or location attracts certain creatures.

gift.name: Bigbys Clenched Fist

gift.name: Otilukes Telekinetic Sphere
gift.desc: As Otilukes resilient sphere, but you move sphere telekinetically.

gift.desc: Blinds all within 10 ft., deals 3d6 damage.

gift.name: Screen
gift.desc: Illusion hides area from vision, scrying.

gift.name: Clone
gift.desc: Duplicate awakens when original dies.

gift.name: Horrid Wilting
gift.desc: Deals 1d8 damage/level within 30 ft.

gift.name: Etherealness
gift.desc: Travel to Ethereal Plane with companions.

gift.name: Iron Body

gift.desc: Changes any subject into anything else.

gift.name: Symbol
gift.desc: Triggered runes have array of effects.

gift.name: Freedom
gift.desc: Releases creature suffering imprisonment.

gift.name: Imprisonment
gift.desc: Entombs subject beneath the earth.

gift.name: Mordenkainens Disjunction
gift.desc: Dispels magic, disenchants magic items.

gift.name: Prismatic Sphere
gift.desc: As prismatic wall, but surrounds on all sides.

gift.name: Gate
gift.desc: Connects two planes for travel or summoning.

gift.name: Power Word, Kill
gift.desc: Kills one tough subject or many weak ones.

gift.name: Summon Monster IX
gift.desc: Calls outsider to fight for you.

gift.name: Foresight
gift.desc: Sixth sense warns of impending danger.

gift.name: Dominate Monster
gift.desc: As dominate person, but any creature.

gift.name: Bigbys Crushing Hand
gift.desc: As Bigbys interposing hand, but stronger.

gift.name: Meteor Swarm
gift.desc: Deals 24d6 fire damage, plus bursts.

gift.name: Weird
gift.desc: As phantasmal killer, but affects all within 30 ft.

gift.name: Astral Projection
gift.desc: Projects you and companions into Astral Plane.

gift.name: Energy Drain
gift.desc: Subject gains 2d4 negative levels.

gift.name: Soul Bind
gift.desc: Traps newly dead soul to prevent resurrection.

gift.name: Wail of the Banshee
gift.desc: Kills one creature/level.

gift.name: Refuge
gift.desc: Alters item to transport its possessor to you.

gift.name: Shapechange
gift.desc: Transforms you into any creature, and change forms once per round.

gift.name: Teleportation Circle
gift.desc: Circle teleports any creature inside to designated spot.

gift.name: Temporal Stasis
gift.desc: Puts subject into suspended animation.

gift.name: Time Stop
gift.desc: You act freely for 1d4+1 rounds.

gift.name: Wish
gift.desc: As limited wish, but with fewer limits.
